title: forgot password account - reset didnt work

embed.description: Straited13 / Silver 2 0LP / 6W 4L Win Ratio 60% / Master Yi - 1W 1L Win Ratio 50%, Jax - 1W 1L Win Ratio 50%

body:
Hi, Italian customer cant help me a lot so try ask on NA because there is a better customer service.

I forgot data of this account, i play rarely on it. In 12/8/17 i change email.. Reset password didnt work on website so I open ticket. I dnt have the information required like bithrday ecc ecc cause i registrer this account with a friend. they refuse send me password on the new mail. why dnt want send me reset password on the old mail??? 
what i can do if I dnt remember all the registrer data of a 3Â° account. I tell them the camp i play normally and buy but they need more information.

I just need a reset password on new or old mail, nothing more.

any suggestion?

sorry for bad english

replies.body: We wouldn't be able to assist with recovery on the boards, discussing account sensitive in a public venue would be a security risk.  Your best bet would be to continue speaking to the account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Even if you don't pass at first, it's totally okay to try again.  We want to help, but we need to be sure the account is going to the right owner.
